alert.note: Alert for Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 8:42PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Benewah, northeastern Whitman and southeastern Spokane Counties through 915 PM PDT... At 842 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Plummer, or 17 miles southwest of St. Maries, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tekoa, Tensed, and Sanders. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 375 and 393. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
